altername_name: ひぐらしのなく頃に奉
name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou
overview: Features: -Features the 19 chapters of the main story, as well as three additional scenarios making their console debut (Outbreak, Outbreak Kamikanshi-hen, and Hinamizawa Teiryuujo) -Theme songs and background music from previous console entries in the series will also be included -In TV mode, Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou on Switch will support full high-definition -Character design for Hinamizawa Teiryuujo is done by Tomozo -Includes “Quiz Oyashiro Ver. 2018.”
